text: khng klaw theid(mu xam mad)wa khır lea ca chwy phwk cea hı phn cak brrda khwam mud khxng thang bk læa thang thale doythi phwk cea wingwxn khx tx khea dwy khwam nxbnxm læa phæw bea wa tha hak phraxngkh thrng chwy rea hı rxdphn cak sing ni læw nænxn phwk kha phraxngkh k ca pen phu thi xyu nı hmu phu ktayyu rukhun
